input.sentences: i was up late last night and i decided to hang out with my son .
he was very excited to spend some time with me .
we went out for a drive .
we stopped at a nearby pond in the morning .
we spent a few hours there chatting .
output.sentences: After coming back from work, he was waiting for his son at night.
His son was not very excited to spend time with him.
He had a serious face as he focused on driving.
It was the next morning when they finally stopped at a nearby pond.
He spent hours chatting with his son, asking about any problem he has or interesting events that happened.
